column4: do you guys know of any linux supported version of msn that is just as good as MSN Messenger?
GAIM has MSN support, not sure what features it lacks

well, I'll try it out.. Haven't used it for years now as I've been stuck with amsn.. But anyway, I just like the way windows MSN messenger handles the webcam sessions and this cute little option for personal messages :)
yea, im not sure about gaim with webcams.  good luck
